Officials would meet ministers on Friday in Egypt. Korea, Japan and China held a summit on Monday in Washington. The governor is in talks with the representatives this Month.
Protestors interrupted [ENT their] [PRD meeting]. The [PRD talks] ended without agreement on [TIM Monday]. The [ENT leaders] held their [PRD meeting] in [PLC Boston]. There are reports that [ENT he] could [PRD meet] separately with Israeli Prime Minister [ENT Ehud Barak] and Palestinian leader [ENT Yasser Arafat]. Russian and U.S. trade [ENT officials] will [PRD meet] in [PLC London] on [TIM May 17]. [ENT He] plans to [PRD meet] with [ENT lawmakers] from both parties. It is obvious that it was simply impossible not to [PRD meet] with [ENT Mr. Sudnikovich]. [ENT He] decided it would probably be a good idea to [PRD meet] with [ENT him].
[ENT Fred] [PRD visited] [ENT Harry] in [PLC New York] on [TIM Friday].
[ENT Bush] and [ENT Putin] [PRD met] [TIM earlier this week] to discuss Chechnya. [ENT China], [ENT Japan], the [ENT United States], and both [ENT Koreas] will hold a [PRD meeting] [TIM this month]. Seven Lebanese Druze [ENT representatives] out of eight who [PRD met] under the leadership of representative Walid Jumblatt called on "youths in our Islamic Arab faction to actively jointhe heroic Palestinian Intifada against Israeli occupation and its agents, and to expose its means and methods." Only representative [ENT Talal Arslan] did not attend the [PRD meeting]. [ENT Tommy] would again be summoned to [PRD meet] [ENT prosecutors] on [TIM Wednesday]. Owens complained to Defense Secretary William Cohen, prompting a [PRD meeting] [TIM Friday] between the [ENT governor] and [ENT Gen. John Coburn], commander of the Army Material Command. Mr. [ENT Erekat] is due to travel to [PLC Washington] to [PRD meet] with US Secretary of State [ENT Madeleine Albright] and other US [ENT officials] attempting to win a ceasefire. Mrs. [ENT Albright] has already [PRD met] with Israel's acting foreign [ENT minister]. Egypt condemned Israel's attacks today and said it has the approval of other Arab states to host a [PRD summit] with the [ENT Palestinians] and [ENT Israelis] only if the violence stops. Eyewitnesses reported that Palestinians demonstrated today Sunday in the West Bank against the Sharm el-Sheikh [PRD summit] to be held in [PLC Egypt] [TIM tomorrow Monday].
